article_title: Kenya turns to its mobile-money dominance to stem the spread of COVID-19
article_description: Kenya s largest teleco  Safaricom  will implement a fee waiver on East Africa s leading mobile money product  M Pesa  to reduce the physical exchange of currency in response to the COVID 19 outbreak  The company announced that all person to person  P2P  trans
